sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; // useNavigate instead of useHistory import { FaSignOutAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; export default function Navbar() { const [isAuthenticated, setIsAuthenticated] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); // Using useNavigate hook for redirection useEffect(() => { // Check if token exists in localStorage const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); if (token) { setIsAuthenticated(true); // User is authenticated } }, []); const handleSignOut = () => { // Remove token and donorId from localStorage localStorage.removeItem('token'); localStorage.removeItem('donorId'); setIsAuthenticated(false); // Update authentication status navigate('/signin'); // Redirect to sign-in page }; return (
  • HOME
  • ABOUT
  • GALLERY
  • CONTACT
    • {isAuthenticated ? ( <>
  • YOUR DONATIONS
    • ) : (
  • SIGN IN
    • )}
); }
